title: Full Stack Developer
description: Led a CMS front-end revamp (Vue 3 + TypeScript + Tailwind), served as the bridge between CMS and experience teams, and demoed the platform to clients in the US and EU.
highlights: Led front-end development efforts for a CMS revision project, utilizing TypeScript, Vue 3, and Tailwind CSS to improve user experience and streamline workflows
Successfully contributed to the development of three generations of CMS frameworks, ensuring the platforms' stability and longevity
Effectively represented Downstream in product demonstrations with clients in the USA, Amsterdam, and England, showcasing our platform's capabilities and building strong client relationships
Bridged the gap between the CMS and experience teams by being the first team member to work on both
Demonstrated proficiency in understanding Rust code and the ability to translate it into practical front-end solutions
